articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Congress leaders meet President Kovind, demand withdrawal of Agnipath scheme
articles.description: India News: NEW DELHI: A delegation of senior Congress leaders on Monday met President Ram Nath Kovind and raised the issue of alleged ill-treatment of party MPs .

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Govt provided social justice with effective last-mile delivery during last 8 years: PM Modi
articles.description: Prime Minister Narendra Modi on Monday enumerated the welfare schemes undertaken by the Central government in the past eight years and said that they have "provided social justice with effective last-mile delivery".

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: India win two bronze on Day 3 of Asian cycling meet
articles.description: India enjoyed a successful outing at the Asian Track Cycling Championship with two bronze medals here on Monday. Ronaldo Singh bagged the country's first-ever international medal in the 1km time trial event. After three days, India has 20 medals in the kitty.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: EPFO adds 17.08 lakh net subscribers in April
articles.description: Out of the total 17.08 lakh subscribers added during the month of April, around 9.23 lakh new members have come under the social security cover of EPF and MP Act, 1952, for the first time.

articles.title: पंत या कार्तिक, भुवी या शमी... कौन खेलेगा टी20 वर्ल्ड कप, पठान ने अपनी टीम से कई स्टार को किया बाहर
articles.description: T20 World Cup 2022: भारतीय टीम के पूर्व ऑलराउंडर इरफान पठान ने टी20 वर्ल्ड कप 2022 के लिए भारतीय टीम की अपनी प्लेइंग इलेवन चुनी है। इसमें उन्होंने ऋषभ पंत और दिनेश कार्तिक में से एक को ही जगह दी है। वहीं टीम के कई स्टार खिलाड़ियों को रखा है।

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Scattered protests during bandh against Agnipath; Army issues notification for registration
articles.description: India News: NEW DELHI/PATNA: Road and rail traffic was partially affected in some regions on Monday during a 'Bharat bandh' called against the Agnipath military r.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Vedanta puts on sale its Sterlite copper smelting plant in TN
articles.description: Vedanta has put on sale its Sterlite copper smelting plant at Thoothukudi in Tamil Nadu after facing a lot of hurdles in reopening the unit and has invited an expression for interest from the potential buyers.

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Archer Deepika Kumari set for India comeback at Paris World Cup
articles.description: Sidelined after the Tokyo Olympics debacle, star Indian archer Deepika Kumari is all set to make an India comeback in the upcoming Stage 3 of the World Cup beginning on Tuesday.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Tata Steel buys coal from Russia weeks after vowing to cut ties
articles.description: Tata Steel had said in April all its manufacturing sites in India, the UK and the Netherlands had sourced alternative supplies of raw materials to end its dependence on Russia, adding it was taking "a conscious decision to stop doing business with Russia."
articles.content: India's top steelmaker imported about 75,000 tonnes of coal from Russia in the second half of May, two trade sources and one government source said, weeks after pledging to stop doing business with R… [+2338 chars]

articles.title: Indian Coast Guard inducts indigenously designed, developed Advanced Light Helicopter Mk-III in Chennai
articles.description: The new squadron will be stationed at Chennai, the headquarters of the Eastern Region of the Coast Guard. Three more ALHs will be added to the inventory of '840 Squadron' shortly.
articles.content: The Indian Coast Guard's Eastern Region, here, inducted the indigenously designed and developed Advanced Light Helicopter (ALH) Mark III, the first aircraft of the newly created "840 Squadron", on Mo… [+1721 chars]

articles.author: PTI
articles.title: Pakistan repatriates 20 Indian fishermen
articles.description: India News: NEW DELHI: Pakistan on Monday said it has repatriated 20 Indian fishermen to India after completion of their jail terms.

articles.description: विपक्ष की ओर से राष्ट्रपति चुनाव में उम्मीदवार कौन होगा इसका जवाब अब तक नहीं मिला है। विपक्ष के संभावित संयुक्त उम्मीदवार एक के बाद एक इनकार करते जा रहे हैं जिसके बाद विपक्ष की मुश्किल बढ़ गई है। वहीं इस सवाल के बीच कल विपक्ष की बैठक होने वाली है।

articles.title: Mumbai vs Mumbai: Rival coaches Pandit and Mujumdar get ready for battle of wits
articles.description: Groomed in an unforgiving 'gharana' where there is virtually no place for the second best, Chandrakant Pandit and Amol Muzumdar are both as tough as nails mentally.

articles.author: Reuters
articles.title: Tata Steel buys coal from Russia weeks after vowing to cut ties
articles.description: India's top steelmaker Tata Steel imported about 75,000 tonnes of coal from Russia in the second half of May, two trade sources and one government source said, weeks after pledging to stop doing business with Russia.

articles.content:

articles.title: Sri Lanka name 19-member squad for white-ball series against India
articles.description: The ODI series will see India play in their first match of the current ICC Women's Championship cycle. It will be the beginning of a new era in ODIs for India, marking their first series after the retirement of influential skipper Mithali Raj.
